name: Pawn Broker Connection
effects: When another player gains an affiliation, you may discard a card to gain 2 affiliation points.

name: Bullhorn
effects: When a person comes into play, you may advance the detection counter, if you do, everyone gains an affiliation point in Distraction.

name: Errant Frisbee
effects: Once per turn, when a player draws a card, you may sacrifice an equipped item. If you do, draw 2 cards.

name: Free Pile Score
effects: Once per turn, when a player discards a card, you may gain an affiliation point.

name: Busted Muffler
effects: When a player plays an item, you may pay an affiliation to reduce the detection counter by 1.

name: Damaged Duffel
effects: When an item goes into evidence from play, you may gain an affiliation point.

name: Shiny Shovel
effects: When a player draws a card, you may discard a card. If you do, gain 2 affiliation points.

name: Lost Wallet
effects: Once per turn, when a player discards a card, you may draw a card or gain an affiliation point.

name: Large Cigar
effects: Once per turn, when a player plays an item, you may discard a card to gain 2 affiliation points.

name: Dark Scarf
effects: When a player gains an affiliation point, you may draw a card, if you do, discard a card.
